nodes.title: YOUR CONFIGURATION READY TO COPY
widgets_values:
15, LINE15
16, LINE16
1, LINE01
2, LINE02
3, LINE03
4, LINE04
5, LINE05
6, LINE06
7, LINE07
8, LINE08
9, LINE09
11, LINE11
12, LINE12
13, LINE13
14, LINE14
15, LINE15
16, LINE16
Starting a new Sequence by changing the Value to 1 !

Set the number of frames the transition should become

Notice: For higher values then 16 you have to change ALL schedulers by adding the needed Lines..

Maybe use the Helper area :=)

Unmute this group and start from frame1, when you pasted in the Values in the textbox (green)

then queue the number of frames/lines you´ve choosen.

it will create the syntax you need in the scheduler

then just copy the purple and paste in the scheduler it belongs to


To start a new sequence you have to reset both Value-Receivers !!!

To empty the list for a new run set the value to 1

even the one in the counter area!
